Name: Marine Radar Simulator - VR
About the game: Become a skipper on your own boat. Choose day, night or fog along the way. Operate Steering wheel, Throttles, Radar, Maps and Autopilot as you would have done on board a real boat. In Screen mode, you use the mouse and keyboard, and you can switch between watching large versions of Radar, Map and Visual, or seeing everyone on the screen at the same time. If you select VR mode, you can also use a gamepad to maneuver and operate the instruments mentioned above. If you only want to be a passenger on the bridge, start a trip that sails a ready-made route automatically (selected in the start-up dialog). You will find a comprehensive and detailed user manual on our website ->
